Self-driving

If no valid information is available, it will be presented as "Taxi, from {{origin}} to {{destination}}, no valid information." Attractions
Name: The name of the attraction.

Address: The physical address of the attraction.
Phone: Contact phone number for the attraction.
Website: URL of the official website for the attraction.
City: The city where the attraction is located, which is Rockford in this case.
Restaurants
Name: The name of the restaurant.
Average Cost: The average cost for a meal at the restaurant, in dollars.
Cuisines: Types of cuisine offered by the restaurant.
Aggregate Rating: The overall rating of the restaurant on a scale.
City: The city where the restaurant is located.
Accommodations
NAME: The name of the accommodation.
price: The price per night for staying at the accommodation.
room type: The type of room offered.
house_rules: Specific rules that guests must follow during their stay.
minimum nights: The minimum number of nights required for booking.
maximum occupancy: The maximum number of people allowed to stay. If the group size exceeds the maximum occupancy, multiple rooms are required to accommodate everyone.
review rate number: A rating or review score, typically out of 5.
city: The city where the accommodation is located, which is Rockford.
Flights
Flight Number: The specific number assigned to the flight.
Price: The cost of the flight ticket.
DepTime: The departure time of the flight.
ArrTime: The arrival time of the flight.
ActualElapsedTime: The duration of the flight.
FlightDate: The date of the flight.
OriginCityName: The city from where the flight departs.
DestCityName: The destination city of the flight.
Distance: The distance flown in miles.

Based on the provided information and query, please give me a detailed plan, including specifics such as flight numbers (e.g., F0123456), restaurant names, and accommodation names. Note that all the information in your plan should be derived from the provided data. You must adhere to the format given in the example. Additionally, all details should align with commonsense. The symbol '-' indicates that information is unnecessary. For example, in the provided sample, you do not need to plan after returning to the departure city. When you travel to two cities in one day, you should note it in the 'Current City' section as in the example (i.e., from A to B).
Background Information:
Attractions
Name: The name of the attraction.
Latitude: The geographical latitude where the attraction is located.
Longitude: The geographical longitude where the attraction is located.
Address: The physical address of the attraction.
Phone: Contact phone number for the attraction.
Website: URL of the official website for the attraction.
City: The city where the attraction is located, which is Rockford in this case.
Restaurants
Name: The name of the restaurant.
Average Cost: The average cost for a meal at the restaurant, in dollars.
Cuisines: Types of cuisine offered by the restaurant.
Aggregate Rating: The overall rating of the restaurant on a scale.
City: The city where the restaurant is located.
Accommodations
NAME: The name of the accommodation.
price: The price per night for staying at the accommodation.
room type: The type of room offered.
house_rules: Specific rules that guests must follow during their stay.
minimum nights: The minimum number of nights required for booking.
maximum occupancy: The maximum number of people allowed to stay. If the group size exceeds the maximum occupancy, multiple rooms are required to accommodate everyone.
review rate number: A rating or review score, typically out of 5.
city: The city where the accommodation is located, which is Rockford.
Flights
Flight Number: The specific number assigned to the flight.
Price: The cost of the flight ticket.
DepTime: The departure time of the flight.
ArrTime: The arrival time of the flight.
ActualElapsedTime: The duration of the flight.
FlightDate: The date of the flight.
OriginCityName: The city from where the flight departs.
DestCityName: The destination city of the flight.
Distance: The distance flown in miles.
Self-driving

If no valid information is available, it will be presented as "Self-driving, from {{origin}} to {{destination}}, no valid information." The default occupancy of a self-driving car is 5 people. If the group size exceeds the maximum occupancy, multiple cars are required to accommodate everyone.
Taxi
Taxi from {{origin}} to {{destination}}, duration: {{duration}}, distance: {{distance}}, cost: {{cost}}. If no valid information is available, it will be presented as "Taxi, from {{origin}} to {{destination}}, no valid information." Name: The name of the attraction.

Accommodations
NAME: The name of the accommodation.
price: The price per night for staying at the accommodation.
room type: The type of room offered.
house_rules: Specific rules that guests must follow during their stay.
minimum nights: The minimum number of nights required for booking.
maximum occupancy: The maximum number of people allowed to stay. If the group size exceeds the maximum occupancy, multiple rooms are required to accommodate everyone.
review rate number: A rating or review score, typically out of 5.

Price: The cost of the flight ticket.
DepTime: The departure time of the flight.
ArrTime: The arrival time of the flight.
ActualElapsedTime: The duration of the flight.
FlightDate: The date of the flight.
OriginCityName: The city from where the flight departs.
DestCityName: The destination city of the flight.
Distance: The distance flown in miles.

Based on the provided information and query, please give me a detailed plan, including specifics such as flight numbers (e.g., F0123456), restaurant names, and accommodation names. Note that all the information in your plan should be derived from the provided data. You must adhere to the format given in the example. Additionally, all details should align with commonsense. The symbol '-' indicates that information is unnecessary. For example, in the provided sample, you do not need to plan after returning to the departure city. When you travel to two cities in one day, you should note it in the 'Current City' section as in the example (i.e., from A to B).
Background Information:
Attractions
Name: The name of the attraction.
Latitude: The geographical latitude where the attraction is located.
Longitude: The geographical longitude where the attraction is located.
Address: The physical address of the attraction.
Phone: Contact phone number for the attraction.
Website: URL of the official website for the attraction.
City: The city where the attraction is located, which is Rockford in this case.
Restaurants
Name: The name of the restaurant.
Average Cost: The average cost for a meal at the restaurant, in dollars.
Cuisines: Types of cuisine offered by the restaurant.
Aggregate Rating: The overall rating of the restaurant on a scale.
City: The city where the restaurant is located.
Accommodations
NAME: The name of the accommodation.
price: The price per night for staying at the accommodation.
room type: The type of room offered.
house_rules: Specific rules that guests must follow during their stay.
minimum nights: The minimum number of nights required for booking.
maximum occupancy: The maximum number of people allowed to stay. If the group size exceeds the maximum occupancy, multiple rooms are required to accommodate everyone.
review rate number: A rating or review score, typically out of 5.
city: The city where the accommodation is located, which is Rockford.
Flights
Flight Number: The specific number assigned to the flight.
Price: The cost of the flight ticket.
DepTime: The departure time of the flight.
ArrTime: The arrival time of the flight.
ActualElapsedTime: The duration of the flight.
FlightDate: The date of the flight.
OriginCityName: The city from where the flight departs.
DestCityName: The destination city of the flight.
Distance: The distance flown in miles.
Self-driving

If no valid information is available, it will be presented as "Self-driving, from {{origin}} to {{destination}}, no valid information." The default occupancy of a self-driving car is 5 people. If the group size exceeds the maximum occupancy, multiple cars are required to accommodate everyone.
Taxi
Taxi from {{origin}} to {{destination}}, duration: {{duration}}, distance: {{distance}}, cost: {{cost}}. If no valid information is available, it will be presented as "Taxi, from {{origin}} to {{destination}}, no valid information." You are a proficient planner. Based on the provided information and query, please give me a detailed plan, including specifics such as flight numbers (e.g., F0123456), restaurant names, and accommodation names. Note that all the information in your plan should be derived from the provided data. You must adhere to the format given in the example. Additionally, all details should align with commonsense. The symbol '-' indicates that information is unnecessary. For example, in the provided sample, you do not need to plan after returning to the departure city. When you travel to two cities in one day, you should note it in the 'Current City' section as in the example (i.e., from A to B).
Background Information:
Attractions
Name: The name of the attraction.
Latitude: The geographical latitude where the attraction is located.
Longitude: The geographical longitude where the attraction is located.
Address: The physical address of the attraction.
Phone: Contact phone number for the attraction.
Website: URL of the official website for the attraction.
City: The city where the attraction is located, which is Rockford in this case.
Restaurants
Name: The name of the restaurant.
Average Cost: The average cost for a meal at the restaurant, in dollars.
Cuisines: Types of cuisine offered by the restaurant.
Aggregate Rating: The overall rating of the restaurant on a scale.
City: The city where the restaurant is located.
Accommodations
NAME: The name of the accommodation.
price: The price per night for staying at the accommodation.
room type: The type of room offered.
house_rules: Specific rules that guests must follow during their stay.
minimum nights: The minimum number of nights required for booking.
maximum occupancy: The maximum number of people allowed to stay. If the group size exceeds the maximum occupancy, multiple rooms are required to accommodate everyone.
review rate number: A rating or review score, typically out of 5.
city: The city where the accommodation is located, which is Rockford.
Flights
Flight Number: The specific number assigned to the flight.
Price: The cost of the flight ticket.
DepTime: The departure time of the flight.
ArrTime: The arrival time of the flight.
ActualElapsedTime: The duration of the flight.
FlightDate: The date of the flight.
OriginCityName: The city from where the flight departs.
DestCityName: The destination city of the flight.
Distance: The distance flown in miles.
Self-driving
Self-driving from {{origin}} to {{destination}}, duration: {{duration}}, distance: {{distance}}, cost: {{cost}}. If no valid information is available, it will be presented as "Self-driving, from {{origin}} to {{destination}}, no valid information." The default occupancy of a self-driving car is 5 people. If the group size exceeds the maximum occupancy, multiple cars are required to accommodate everyone.
Taxi
Taxi from {{origin}} to {{destination}}, duration: {{duration}}, distance: {{distance}}, cost: {{cost}}. If no valid information is available, it will be presented as "Taxi, from {{origin}} to {{destination}}, no valid information." If the group size exceeds the maximum occupancy, multiple cars are required to accommodate everyone.

You are a proficient planner. Based on the provided information and query, please give me a detailed plan, including specifics such as flight numbers (e.g., F0123456), restaurant names, and accommodation names. Note that all the information in your plan should be derived from the provided data. You must adhere to the format given in the example. Additionally, all details should align with commonsense. The symbol '-' indicates that information is unnecessary. For example, in the provided sample, you do not need to plan after returning to the departure city. When you travel to two cities in one day, you should note it in the 'Current City' section as in the example (i.e., from A to B).
Background Information:
Attractions
Name: The name of the attraction.
Latitude: The geographical latitude where the attraction is located.
Longitude: The geographical longitude where the attraction is located.
Address: The physical address of the attraction.
Phone: Contact phone number for the attraction.
Website: URL of the official website for the attraction.
City: The city where the attraction is located, which is Rockford in this case.
Restaurants
Name: The name of the restaurant.
Average Cost: The average cost for a meal at the restaurant, in dollars.
Cuisines: Types of cuisine offered by the restaurant.
Aggregate Rating: The overall rating of the restaurant on a scale.
City: The city where the restaurant is located.
Accommodations
NAME: The name of the accommodation.
price: The price per night for staying at the accommodation.
room type: The type of room offered.
house_rules: Specific rules that guests must follow during their stay.
minimum nights: The minimum number of nights required for booking.
maximum occupancy: The maximum number of people allowed to stay. If the group size exceeds the maximum occupancy, multiple rooms are required to accommodate everyone.
review rate number: A rating or review score, typically out of 5.
city: The city where the accommodation is located, which is Rockford.
Flights
Flight Number: The specific number assigned to the flight.
Price: The cost of the flight ticket.
DepTime: The departure time of the flight.
ArrTime: The arrival time of the flight.
ActualElapsedTime: The duration of the flight.
FlightDate: The date of the flight.
OriginCityName: The city from where the flight departs.
DestCityName: The destination city of the flight.
Distance: The distance flown in miles.
Self-driving
Self-driving from {{origin}} to {{destination}}, duration: {{duration}}, distance: {{distance}}, cost: {{cost}}. If no valid information is available, it will be presented as "Self-driving, from {{origin}} to {{destination}}, no valid information." The default occupancy of a self-driving car is 5 people. If the group size exceeds the maximum occupancy, multiple cars are required to accommodate everyone.
Taxi
Taxi from {{origin}} to {{destination}}, duration: {{duration}}, distance: {{distance}}, cost: {{cost}}. If no valid information is available, it will be presented as "Taxi, from {{origin}} to {{destination}}, no valid information." If the group size exceeds the maximum occupancy, multiple cars are required to accommodate everyone.

You are a proficient planner. Based on the provided information and query, please give me a detailed plan, including specifics such as flight numbers (e.g., F0123456), restaurant names, and accommodation names. Note that all the information in your plan should be derived from the provided data. You must adhere to the format given in the example. Additionally, all details should align with commonsense. The symbol '-' indicates that information is unnecessary. For example, in the provided sample, you do not need to plan after returning to the departure city. When you travel to two cities in one day, you should note it in the 'Current City' section as in the example (i.e., from A to B).
Background Information:
Attractions
Name: The name of the attraction.
Latitude: The geographical latitude where the attraction is located.
Longitude: The geographical longitude where the attraction is located.
Address: The physical address of the attraction.
Phone: Contact phone number for the attraction.
Website: URL of the official website for the attraction.
City: The city where the attraction is located, which is Rockford in this case.
Restaurants
Name: The name of the restaurant.
Average Cost: The average cost for a meal at the restaurant, in dollars.
Cuisines: Types of cuisine offered by the restaurant.
Aggregate Rating: The overall rating of the restaurant on a scale.
City: The city where the restaurant is located.
Accommodations
NAME: The name of the accommodation.
price: The price per night for staying at the accommodation.
room type: The type of room offered.
house_rules: Specific rules that guests must follow during their stay.
minimum nights: The minimum number of nights required for booking.
maximum occupancy: The maximum number of people allowed to stay. If the group size exceeds the maximum occupancy, multiple rooms are required to accommodate everyone.
review rate number: A rating or review score, typically out of 5.
city: The city where the accommodation is located, which is Rockford.
Flights
Flight Number: The specific number assigned to the flight.
Price: The cost of the flight ticket.
DepTime: The departure time of the flight.
ArrTime: The arrival time of the flight.
ActualElapsedTime: The duration of the flight.
FlightDate: The date of the flight.
OriginCityName: The city from where the flight departs.
DestCityName: The destination city of the flight.
Distance: The distance flown in miles.
Self-driving
Self-driving from {{origin}} to {{destination}}, duration: {{duration}}, distance: {{distance}}, cost: {{cost}}. If no valid information is available, it will be presented as "Self-driving, from {{origin}} to {{destination}}, no valid information." The default occupancy of a self-driving car is 5 people. If the group size exceeds the maximum occupancy, multiple cars are required to accommodate everyone.
Taxi
Taxi from {{origin}} to {{destination}}, duration: {{duration}}, distance: {{distance}}, cost: {{cost}}. If no valid information is available, it will be presented as "Taxi, from {{origin}} to {{destination}}, no valid information." If the group size exceeds the maximum occupancy, multiple cars are required to accommodate everyone.

Accommodations
NAME: The name of the accommodation.
price: The price per night for staying at the accommodation.
room type: The type of room offered.
house_rules: Specific rules that guests must follow during their stay.

review rate number: A rating or review score, typically out of 5.

Flights

Price: The cost of the flight ticket.
DepTime: The departure time of the flight.
ArrTime: The arrival time of the flight.
ActualElapsedTime: The duration of the flight.
FlightDate: The date of the flight.
OriginCityName: The city from where the flight departs.

Distance: The distance flown in miles.

Based on the provided information and query, please give me a detailed plan, including specifics such as flight numbers (e.g., F0123456), restaurant names, and accommodation names. Note that all the information in your plan should be derived from the provided data. You must adhere to the format given in the example. Additionally, all details should align with commonsense. The symbol '-' indicates that information is unnecessary. For example, in the provided sample, you do not need to plan after returning to the departure city. When you travel to two cities in one day, you should note it in the 'Current City' section as in the example (i.e., from A to B).
Background Information:
Attractions
Name: The name of the attraction.
Latitude: The geographical latitude where the attraction is located.
Longitude: The geographical longitude where the attraction is located.
Address: The physical address of the attraction.
Phone: Contact phone number for the attraction.
Website: URL of the official website for the attraction.
City: The city where the attraction is located, which is Rockford in this case.
Restaurants
Name: The name of the restaurant.
Average Cost: The average cost for a meal at the restaurant, in dollars.
Cuisines: Types of cuisine offered by the restaurant.
Aggregate Rating: The overall rating of the restaurant on a scale.
City: The city where the restaurant is located.
Accommodations
NAME: The name of the accommodation.
price: The price per night for staying at the accommodation.
room type: The type of room offered.
house_rules: Specific rules that guests must follow during their stay.
minimum nights: The minimum number of nights required for booking.
maximum occupancy: The maximum number of people allowed to stay. If the group size exceeds the maximum occupancy, multiple rooms are required to accommodate everyone.
review rate number: A rating or review score, typically out of 5.
city: The city where the accommodation is located, which is Rockford.
Flights
Flight Number: The specific number assigned to the flight.
Price: The cost of the flight ticket.
DepTime: The departure time of the flight.
ArrTime: The arrival time of the flight.
ActualElapsedTime: The duration of the flight.
FlightDate: The date of the flight.
OriginCityName: The city from where the flight departs.
DestCityName: The destination city of the flight.
Distance: The distance flown in miles.
Self-driving
Self-driving from {{origin}} to {{destination}}, duration: {{duration}}, distance: {{distance}}, cost: {{cost}}. If no valid information is available, it will be presented as "Self-driving, from {{origin}} to {{destination}}, no valid information." The default occupancy of a self-driving car is 5 people. If the group size exceeds the maximum occupancy, multiple cars are required to accommodate everyone.
Taxi
Taxi from {{origin}} to {{destination}}, duration: {{duration}}, distance: {{distance}}, cost: {{cost}}. If no valid information is available, it will be presented as "Taxi, from {{origin}} to {{destination}}, no valid information." If the group size exceeds the maximum occupancy, multiple cars are required to accommodate everyone.

Cuisines: Types of cuisine offered by the restaurant.
Aggregate Rating: The overall rating of the restaurant on a scale.
City: The city where the restaurant is located.
Accommodations
NAME: The name of the accommodation.
price: The price per night for staying at the accommodation.
room type: The type of room offered.
house_rules: Specific rules that guests must follow during their stay.
minimum nights: The minimum number of nights required for booking.
maximum occupancy: The maximum number of people allowed to stay. If the group size exceeds the maximum occupancy, multiple rooms are required to accommodate everyone.
review rate number: A rating or review score, typically out of 5.
city: The city where the accommodation is located, which is Rockford.
Flights
Flight Number: The specific number assigned to the flight.
Price: The cost of the flight ticket.
DepTime: The departure time of the flight.
ArrTime: The arrival time of the flight.
ActualElapsedTime: The duration of the flight.
FlightDate: The date of the flight.
OriginCityName: The city from where the flight departs.
DestCityName: The destination city of the flight.
Distance: The distance flown in miles.

price: The price per night for staying at the accommodation.
room type: The type of room offered.
house_rules: Specific rules that guests must follow during their stay.

maximum occupancy: The maximum number of people allowed to stay. If the group size exceeds the maximum occupancy, multiple rooms are required to accommodate everyone.
review rate number: A rating or review score, typically out of 5.

Flights

Price: The cost of the flight ticket.
DepTime: The departure time of the flight.
ArrTime: The arrival time of the flight.
ActualElapsedTime: The duration of the flight.

OriginCityName: The city from where the flight departs.

Attractions
Name: The name of the attraction.

Website: URL of the official website for the attraction.

Restaurants

Cuisines: Types of cuisine offered by the restaurant.
Aggregate Rating: The overall rating of the restaurant on a scale.
City: The city where the restaurant is located.
Accommodations
NAME: The name of the accommodation.
price: The price per night for staying at the accommodation.
room type: The type of room offered.
house_rules: Specific rules that guests must follow during their stay.
minimum nights: The minimum number of nights required for booking.
maximum occupancy: The maximum number of people allowed to stay. If the group size exceeds the maximum occupancy, multiple rooms are required to accommodate everyone.
review rate number: A rating or review score, typically out of 5.
city: The city where the accommodation is located, which is Rockford.
Flights
Flight Number: The specific number assigned to the flight.
Price: The cost of the flight ticket.
DepTime: The departure time of the flight.
ArrTime: The arrival time of the flight.
ActualElapsedTime: The duration of the flight.
FlightDate: The date of the flight.
OriginCityName: The city from where the flight departs.
DestCityName: The destination city of the flight.
Distance: The distance flown in miles.

Background Information:
Attractions
Name: The name of the attraction.
Latitude: The geographical latitude where the attraction is located.
Longitude: The geographical longitude where the attraction is located.
Address: The physical address of the attraction.
Phone: Contact phone number for the attraction.
Website: URL of the official website for the attraction.
City: The city where the attraction is located, which is Rockford in this case.
Restaurants
Name: The name of the restaurant.
Average Cost: The average cost for a meal at the restaurant, in dollars.
Cuisines: Types of cuisine offered by the restaurant.
Aggregate Rating: The overall rating of the restaurant on a scale.
City: The city where the restaurant is located.
Accommodations
NAME: The name of the accommodation.
price: The price per night for staying at the accommodation.
room type: The type of room offered.
house_rules: Specific rules that guests must follow during their stay.
minimum nights: The minimum number of nights required for booking.
maximum occupancy: The maximum number of people allowed to stay. If the group size exceeds the maximum occupancy, multiple rooms are required to accommodate everyone.
review rate number: A rating or review score, typically out of 5.
city: The city where the accommodation is located, which is Rockford.
Flights
Flight Number: The specific number assigned to the flight.
Price: The cost of the flight ticket.
DepTime: The departure time of the flight.
ArrTime: The arrival time of the flight.
ActualElapsedTime: The duration of the flight.
FlightDate: The date of the flight.
OriginCityName: The city from where the flight departs.
DestCityName: The destination city of the flight.
Distance: The distance flown in miles.
Self-driving

Based on the provided information and query, please give me a detailed plan, including specifics such as flight numbers (e.g., F0123456), restaurant names, and accommodation names. Note that all the information in your plan should be derived from the provided data. You must adhere to the format given in the example. Additionally, all details should align with commonsense. The symbol '-' indicates that information is unnecessary. For example, in the provided sample, you do not need to plan after returning to the departure city. When you travel to two cities in one day, you should note it in the 'Current City' section as in the example (i.e., from A to B).
Background Information:
Attractions
Name: The name of the attraction.
Latitude: The geographical latitude where the attraction is located.
Longitude: The geographical longitude where the attraction is located.
Address: The physical address of the attraction.
Phone: Contact phone number for the attraction.
Website: URL of the official website for the attraction.
City: The city where the attraction is located, which is Rockford in this case.
Restaurants
Name: The name of the restaurant.
Average Cost: The average cost for a meal at the restaurant, in dollars.
Cuisines: Types of cuisine offered by the restaurant.
Aggregate Rating: The overall rating of the restaurant on a scale.
City: The city where the restaurant is located.
Accommodations
NAME: The name of the accommodation.
price: The price per night for staying at the accommodation.
room type: The type of room offered.
house_rules: Specific rules that guests must follow during their stay.
minimum nights: The minimum number of nights required for booking.
maximum occupancy: The maximum number of people allowed to stay. If the group size exceeds the maximum occupancy, multiple rooms are required to accommodate everyone.
review rate number: A rating or review score, typically out of 5.
city: The city where the accommodation is located, which is Rockford.
Flights
Flight Number: The specific number assigned to the flight.
Price: The cost of the flight ticket.
DepTime: The departure time of the flight.
ArrTime: The arrival time of the flight.
ActualElapsedTime: The duration of the flight.
FlightDate: The date of the flight.
OriginCityName: The city from where the flight departs.
DestCityName: The destination city of the flight.
Distance: The distance flown in miles.
Self-driving
Self-driving from {{origin}} to {{destination}}, duration: {{duration}}, distance: {{distance}}, cost: {{cost}}. If no valid information is available, it will be presented as "Self-driving, from {{origin}} to {{destination}}, no valid information." The default occupancy of a self-driving car is 5 people. If the group size exceeds the maximum occupancy, multiple cars are required to accommodate everyone.
Taxi
Taxi from {{origin}} to {{destination}}, duration: {{duration}}, distance: {{distance}}, cost: {{cost}}. If no valid information is available, it will be presented as "Taxi, from {{origin}} to {{destination}}, no valid information." If the group size exceeds the maximum occupancy, multiple cars are required to accommodate everyone.

You are a proficient planner. Based on the provided information and query, please give me a detailed plan, including specifics such as flight numbers (e.g., F0123456), restaurant names, and accommodation names. Note that all the information in your plan should be derived from the provided data. You must adhere to the format given in the example. Additionally, all details should align with commonsense. The symbol '-' indicates that information is unnecessary. For example, in the provided sample, you do not need to plan after returning to the departure city. When you travel to two cities in one day, you should note it in the 'Current City' section as in the example (i.e., from A to B).
Background Information:
Attractions
Name: The name of the attraction.
Latitude: The geographical latitude where the attraction is located.
Longitude: The geographical longitude where the attraction is located.
Address: The physical address of the attraction.
Phone: Contact phone number for the attraction.
Website: URL of the official website for the attraction.
City: The city where the attraction is located, which is Rockford in this case.
Restaurants
Name: The name of the restaurant.
Average Cost: The average cost for a meal at the restaurant, in dollars.
Cuisines: Types of cuisine offered by the restaurant.
Aggregate Rating: The overall rating of the restaurant on a scale.
City: The city where the restaurant is located.
Accommodations
NAME: The name of the accommodation.
price: The price per night for staying at the accommodation.
room type: The type of room offered.
house_rules: Specific rules that guests must follow during their stay.
minimum nights: The minimum number of nights required for booking.
maximum occupancy: The maximum number of people allowed to stay. If the group size exceeds the maximum occupancy, multiple rooms are required to accommodate everyone.
review rate number: A rating or review score, typically out of 5.
city: The city where the accommodation is located, which is Rockford.
Flights
Flight Number: The specific number assigned to the flight.
Price: The cost of the flight ticket.
DepTime: The departure time of the flight.
ArrTime: The arrival time of the flight.
ActualElapsedTime: The duration of the flight.
FlightDate: The date of the flight.
OriginCityName: The city from where the flight departs.
DestCityName: The destination city of the flight.
Distance: The distance flown in miles.
Self-driving
Self-driving from {{origin}} to {{destination}}, duration: {{duration}}, distance: {{distance}}, cost: {{cost}}. If no valid information is available, it will be presented as "Self-driving, from {{origin}} to {{destination}}, no valid information." The default occupancy of a self-driving car is 5 people. If the group size exceeds the maximum occupancy, multiple cars are required to accommodate everyone.
Taxi
Taxi from {{origin}} to {{destination}}, duration: {{duration}}, distance: {{distance}}, cost: {{cost}}. If no valid information is available, it will be presented as "Taxi, from {{origin}} to {{destination}}, no valid information." If the group size exceeds the maximum occupancy, multiple cars are required to accommodate everyone.

Name: The name of the attraction.

Website: URL of the official website for the attraction.

Restaurants

Average Cost: The average cost for a meal at the restaurant, in dollars.
Cuisines: Types of cuisine offered by the restaurant.
Aggregate Rating: The overall rating of the restaurant on a scale.
City: The city where the restaurant is located.
Accommodations
NAME: The name of the accommodation.
price: The price per night for staying at the accommodation.
room type: The type of room offered.
house_rules: Specific rules that guests must follow during their stay.
minimum nights: The minimum number of nights required for booking.
maximum occupancy: The maximum number of people allowed to stay. If the group size exceeds the maximum occupancy, multiple rooms are required to accommodate everyone.
review rate number: A rating or review score, typically out of 5.
city: The city where the accommodation is located, which is Rockford.
Flights
Flight Number: The specific number assigned to the flight.
Price: The cost of the flight ticket.
DepTime: The departure time of the flight.
ArrTime: The arrival time of the flight.
ActualElapsedTime: The duration of the flight.
FlightDate: The date of the flight.
OriginCityName: The city from where the flight departs.
DestCityName: The destination city of the flight.
Distance: The distance flown in miles.

The symbol '-' indicates that information is unnecessary. For example, in the provided sample, you do not need to plan after returning to the departure city. Background Information:
Attractions
Name: The name of the attraction.
Latitude: The geographical latitude where the attraction is located.
Longitude: The geographical longitude where the attraction is located.
Address: The physical address of the attraction.
Phone: Contact phone number for the attraction.
Website: URL of the official website for the attraction.
City: The city where the attraction is located, which is Rockford in this case.
Restaurants
Name: The name of the restaurant.
Average Cost: The average cost for a meal at the restaurant, in dollars.
Cuisines: Types of cuisine offered by the restaurant.
Aggregate Rating: The overall rating of the restaurant on a scale.
City: The city where the restaurant is located.
Accommodations
NAME: The name of the accommodation.
price: The price per night for staying at the accommodation.

Attractions
Name: The name of the attraction.

Website: URL of the official website for the attraction.
City: The city where the attraction is located, which is Rockford in this case.
Restaurants

Average Cost: The average cost for a meal at the restaurant, in dollars.
Cuisines: Types of cuisine offered by the restaurant.
Aggregate Rating: The overall rating of the restaurant on a scale.
City: The city where the restaurant is located.
Accommodations
NAME: The name of the accommodation.
price: The price per night for staying at the accommodation.
room type: The type of room offered.
house_rules: Specific rules that guests must follow during their stay.
minimum nights: The minimum number of nights required for booking.
maximum occupancy: The maximum number of people allowed to stay. If the group size exceeds the maximum occupancy, multiple rooms are required to accommodate everyone.
review rate number: A rating or review score, typically out of 5.
city: The city where the accommodation is located, which is Rockford.
Flights
Flight Number: The specific number assigned to the flight.
Price: The cost of the flight ticket.
DepTime: The departure time of the flight.
ArrTime: The arrival time of the flight.
ActualElapsedTime: The duration of the flight.
FlightDate: The date of the flight.
OriginCityName: The city from where the flight departs.
DestCityName: The destination city of the flight.
Distance: The distance flown in miles.

Based on the provided information and query, please give me a detailed plan, including specifics such as flight numbers (e.g., F0123456), restaurant names, and accommodation names. Average Cost: The average cost for a meal at the restaurant, in dollars.
Cuisines: Types of cuisine offered by the restaurant.
Aggregate Rating: The overall rating of the restaurant on a scale.
City: The city where the restaurant is located.
Accommodations
NAME: The name of the accommodation.
price: The price per night for staying at the accommodation.
room type: The type of room offered.
house_rules: Specific rules that guests must follow during their stay.
minimum nights: The minimum number of nights required for booking.
maximum occupancy: The maximum number of people allowed to stay. If the group size exceeds the maximum occupancy, multiple rooms are required to accommodate everyone.
review rate number: A rating or review score, typically out of 5.
city: The city where the accommodation is located, which is Rockford.
Flights
Flight Number: The specific number assigned to the flight.
Price: The cost of the flight ticket.
DepTime: The departure time of the flight.
ArrTime: The arrival time of the flight.
ActualElapsedTime: The duration of the flight.
FlightDate: The date of the flight.
OriginCityName: The city from where the flight departs.

Attractions
Name: The name of the attraction.
Latitude: The geographical latitude where the attraction is located.
Longitude: The geographical longitude where the attraction is located.
Address: The physical address of the attraction.
Phone: Contact phone number for the attraction.
Website: URL of the official website for the attraction.
City: The city where the attraction is located, which is Rockford in this case.
Restaurants
Name: The name of the restaurant.
Average Cost: The average cost for a meal at the restaurant, in dollars.
Cuisines: Types of cuisine offered by the restaurant.
Aggregate Rating: The overall rating of the restaurant on a scale.
City: The city where the restaurant is located.
Accommodations
NAME: The name of the accommodation.
price: The price per night for staying at the accommodation.
room type: The type of room offered.
house_rules: Specific rules that guests must follow during their stay.
minimum nights: The minimum number of nights required for booking.
maximum occupancy: The maximum number of people allowed to stay. If the group size exceeds the maximum occupancy, multiple rooms are required to accommodate everyone.
review rate number: A rating or review score, typically out of 5.
city: The city where the accommodation is located, which is Rockford.
Flights
Flight Number: The specific number assigned to the flight.
Price: The cost of the flight ticket.
DepTime: The departure time of the flight.
ArrTime: The arrival time of the flight.
ActualElapsedTime: The duration of the flight.
FlightDate: The date of the flight.
OriginCityName: The city from where the flight departs.
DestCityName: The destination city of the flight.
Distance: The distance flown in miles.

The symbol '-' indicates that information is unnecessary. For example, in the provided sample, you do not need to plan after returning to the departure city. When you travel to two cities in one day, you should note it in the 'Current City' section as in the example (i.e., from A to B).
Background Information:
Attractions
Name: The name of the attraction.
Latitude: The geographical latitude where the attraction is located.
Longitude: The geographical longitude where the attraction is located.
Address: The physical address of the attraction.
Phone: Contact phone number for the attraction.
Website: URL of the official website for the attraction.
City: The city where the attraction is located, which is Rockford in this case.
Restaurants
Name: The name of the restaurant.
Average Cost: The average cost for a meal at the restaurant, in dollars.
Cuisines: Types of cuisine offered by the restaurant.
Aggregate Rating: The overall rating of the restaurant on a scale.
City: The city where the restaurant is located.
Accommodations
NAME: The name of the accommodation.
price: The price per night for staying at the accommodation.
room type: The type of room offered.
house_rules: Specific rules that guests must follow during their stay.
minimum nights: The minimum number of nights required for booking.
maximum occupancy: The maximum number of people allowed to stay. If the group size exceeds the maximum occupancy, multiple rooms are required to accommodate everyone.
review rate number: A rating or review score, typically out of 5.
city: The city where the accommodation is located, which is Rockford.
Flights
Flight Number: The specific number assigned to the flight.
Price: The cost of the flight ticket.
DepTime: The departure time of the flight.
ArrTime: The arrival time of the flight.
ActualElapsedTime: The duration of the flight.
FlightDate: The date of the flight.
OriginCityName: The city from where the flight departs.
DestCityName: The destination city of the flight.
Distance: The distance flown in miles.
Self-driving

If no valid information is available, it will be presented as "Self-driving, from {{origin}} to {{destination}}, no valid information." The default occupancy of a self-driving car is 5 people. If the group size exceeds the maximum occupancy, multiple cars are required to accommodate everyone.
Taxi

The symbol '-' indicates that information is unnecessary. For example, in the provided sample, you do not need to plan after returning to the departure city. Background Information:
Attractions
Name: The name of the attraction.
Latitude: The geographical latitude where the attraction is located.
Longitude: The geographical longitude where the attraction is located.
Address: The physical address of the attraction.
Phone: Contact phone number for the attraction.
Website: URL of the official website for the attraction.
City: The city where the attraction is located, which is Rockford in this case.
Restaurants
Name: The name of the restaurant.
Average Cost: The average cost for a meal at the restaurant, in dollars.
Cuisines: Types of cuisine offered by the restaurant.
Aggregate Rating: The overall rating of the restaurant on a scale.
City: The city where the restaurant is located.
Accommodations
NAME: The name of the accommodation.
price: The price per night for staying at the accommodation.
room type: The type of room offered.
house_rules: Specific rules that guests must follow during their stay.
minimum nights: The minimum number of nights required for booking.
maximum occupancy: The maximum number of people allowed to stay. If the group size exceeds the maximum occupancy, multiple rooms are required to accommodate everyone.
review rate number: A rating or review score, typically out of 5.
city: The city where the accommodation is located, which is Rockford.
Flights
Flight Number: The specific number assigned to the flight.
Price: The cost of the flight ticket.
DepTime: The departure time of the flight.
ArrTime: The arrival time of the flight.
ActualElapsedTime: The duration of the flight.
FlightDate: The date of the flight.
OriginCityName: The city from where the flight departs.
DestCityName: The destination city of the flight.
Distance: The distance flown in miles.

You are a proficient planner. Based on the provided information and query, please give me a detailed plan, including specifics such as flight numbers (e.g., F0123456), restaurant names, and accommodation names. Note that all the information in your plan should be derived from the provided data. You must adhere to the format given in the example. Additionally, all details should align with commonsense. The symbol '-' indicates that information is unnecessary. For example, in the provided sample, you do not need to plan after returning to the departure city. When you travel to two cities in one day, you should note it in the 'Current City' section as in the example (i.e., from A to B).
Background Information:
Attractions
Name: The name of the attraction.
Latitude: The geographical latitude where the attraction is located.
Longitude: The geographical longitude where the attraction is located.
Address: The physical address of the attraction.
Phone: Contact phone number for the attraction.
Website: URL of the official website for the attraction.
City: The city where the attraction is located, which is Rockford in this case.
Restaurants
Name: The name of the restaurant.
Average Cost: The average cost for a meal at the restaurant, in dollars.
Cuisines: Types of cuisine offered by the restaurant.
Aggregate Rating: The overall rating of the restaurant on a scale.
City: The city where the restaurant is located.
Accommodations
NAME: The name of the accommodation.
price: The price per night for staying at the accommodation.
room type: The type of room offered.
house_rules: Specific rules that guests must follow during their stay.
minimum nights: The minimum number of nights required for booking.
maximum occupancy: The maximum number of people allowed to stay. If the group size exceeds the maximum occupancy, multiple rooms are required to accommodate everyone.
review rate number: A rating or review score, typically out of 5.
city: The city where the accommodation is located, which is Rockford.
Flights
Flight Number: The specific number assigned to the flight.
Price: The cost of the flight ticket.
DepTime: The departure time of the flight.
ArrTime: The arrival time of the flight.
ActualElapsedTime: The duration of the flight.
FlightDate: The date of the flight.
OriginCityName: The city from where the flight departs.
DestCityName: The destination city of the flight.
Distance: The distance flown in miles.
Self-driving
Self-driving from {{origin}} to {{destination}}, duration: {{duration}}, distance: {{distance}}, cost: {{cost}}. If no valid information is available, it will be presented as "Self-driving, from {{origin}} to {{destination}}, no valid information." The default occupancy of a self-driving car is 5 people. If the group size exceeds the maximum occupancy, multiple cars are required to accommodate everyone.
Taxi
Taxi from {{origin}} to {{destination}}, duration: {{duration}}, distance: {{distance}}, cost: {{cost}}. If no valid information is available, it will be presented as "Taxi, from {{origin}} to {{destination}}, no valid information." If the group size exceeds the maximum occupancy, multiple cars are required to accommodate everyone.

You are a proficient planner. Based on the provided information and query, please give me a detailed plan, including specifics such as flight numbers (e.g., F0123456), restaurant names, and accommodation names. Note that all the information in your plan should be derived from the provided data. You must adhere to the format given in the example. Additionally, all details should align with commonsense. The symbol '-' indicates that information is unnecessary. For example, in the provided sample, you do not need to plan after returning to the departure city. When you travel to two cities in one day, you should note it in the 'Current City' section as in the example (i.e., from A to B).
Background Information:
Attractions
Name: The name of the attraction.
Latitude: The geographical latitude where the attraction is located.
Longitude: The geographical longitude where the attraction is located.
Address: The physical address of the attraction.
Phone: Contact phone number for the attraction.
Website: URL of the official website for the attraction.
City: The city where the attraction is located, which is Rockford in this case.
Restaurants
Name: The name of the restaurant.
Average Cost: The average cost for a meal at the restaurant, in dollars.
Cuisines: Types of cuisine offered by the restaurant.
Aggregate Rating: The overall rating of the restaurant on a scale.
City: The city where the restaurant is located.
Accommodations
NAME: The name of the accommodation.
price: The price per night for staying at the accommodation.
room type: The type of room offered.
house_rules: Specific rules that guests must follow during their stay.
minimum nights: The minimum number of nights required for booking.
maximum occupancy: The maximum number of people allowed to stay. If the group size exceeds the maximum occupancy, multiple rooms are required to accommodate everyone.
review rate number: A rating or review score, typically out of 5.
city: The city where the accommodation is located, which is Rockford.
Flights
Flight Number: The specific number assigned to the flight.
Price: The cost of the flight ticket.
DepTime: The departure time of the flight.
ArrTime: The arrival time of the flight.
ActualElapsedTime: The duration of the flight.
FlightDate: The date of the flight.
OriginCityName: The city from where the flight departs.
DestCityName: The destination city of the flight.
Distance: The distance flown in miles.
Self-driving
Self-driving from {{origin}} to {{destination}}, duration: {{duration}}, distance: {{distance}}, cost: {{cost}}. If no valid information is available, it will be presented as "Self-driving, from {{origin}} to {{destination}}, no valid information." The default occupancy of a self-driving car is 5 people. If the group size exceeds the maximum occupancy, multiple cars are required to accommodate everyone.
Taxi
Taxi from {{origin}} to {{destination}}, duration: {{duration}}, distance: {{distance}}, cost: {{cost}}. If no valid information is available, it will be presented as "Taxi, from {{origin}} to {{destination}}, no valid information." If the group size exceeds the maximum occupancy, multiple cars are required to accommodate everyone.

Background Information:
Attractions
Name: The name of the attraction.
Latitude: The geographical latitude where the attraction is located.
Longitude: The geographical longitude where the attraction is located.
Address: The physical address of the attraction.
Phone: Contact phone number for the attraction.
Website: URL of the official website for the attraction.
City: The city where the attraction is located, which is Rockford in this case.
Restaurants
Name: The name of the restaurant.
Average Cost: The average cost for a meal at the restaurant, in dollars.
Cuisines: Types of cuisine offered by the restaurant.
Aggregate Rating: The overall rating of the restaurant on a scale.
City: The city where the restaurant is located.
Accommodations
NAME: The name of the accommodation.
price: The price per night for staying at the accommodation.
room type: The type of room offered.
house_rules: Specific rules that guests must follow during their stay.
minimum nights: The minimum number of nights required for booking.
maximum occupancy: The maximum number of people allowed to stay. If the group size exceeds the maximum occupancy, multiple rooms are required to accommodate everyone.
review rate number: A rating or review score, typically out of 5.
city: The city where the accommodation is located, which is Rockford.
Flights
Flight Number: The specific number assigned to the flight.
Price: The cost of the flight ticket.
DepTime: The departure time of the flight.
ArrTime: The arrival time of the flight.
ActualElapsedTime: The duration of the flight.
FlightDate: The date of the flight.
OriginCityName: The city from where the flight departs.
DestCityName: The destination city of the flight.
Distance: The distance flown in miles.

Note that all the information in your plan should be derived from the provided data. You must adhere to the format given in the example. Additionally, all details should align with commonsense. The symbol '-' indicates that information is unnecessary. For example, in the provided sample, you do not need to plan after returning to the departure city. When you travel to two cities in one day, you should note it in the 'Current City' section as in the example (i.e., from A to B).
Background Information:
Attractions
Name: The name of the attraction.
Latitude: The geographical latitude where the attraction is located.
Longitude: The geographical longitude where the attraction is located.
Address: The physical address of the attraction.
Phone: Contact phone number for the attraction.
Website: URL of the official website for the attraction.
City: The city where the attraction is located, which is Rockford in this case.
Restaurants
Name: The name of the restaurant.
Average Cost: The average cost for a meal at the restaurant, in dollars.
Cuisines: Types of cuisine offered by the restaurant.
Aggregate Rating: The overall rating of the restaurant on a scale.
City: The city where the restaurant is located.
Accommodations
NAME: The name of the accommodation.
price: The price per night for staying at the accommodation.
room type: The type of room offered.
house_rules: Specific rules that guests must follow during their stay.
minimum nights: The minimum number of nights required for booking.
maximum occupancy: The maximum number of people allowed to stay. If the group size exceeds the maximum occupancy, multiple rooms are required to accommodate everyone.
review rate number: A rating or review score, typically out of 5.
city: The city where the accommodation is located, which is Rockford.
Flights
Flight Number: The specific number assigned to the flight.
Price: The cost of the flight ticket.
DepTime: The departure time of the flight.
ArrTime: The arrival time of the flight.
ActualElapsedTime: The duration of the flight.
FlightDate: The date of the flight.
OriginCityName: The city from where the flight departs.
DestCityName: The destination city of the flight.
Distance: The distance flown in miles.
Self-driving
Self-driving from {{origin}} to {{destination}}, duration: {{duration}}, distance: {{distance}}, cost: {{cost}}. If no valid information is available, it will be presented as "Self-driving, from {{origin}} to {{destination}}, no valid information." The default occupancy of a self-driving car is 5 people. If the group size exceeds the maximum occupancy, multiple cars are required to accommodate everyone.
Taxi
Taxi from {{origin}} to {{destination}}, duration: {{duration}}, distance: {{distance}}, cost: {{cost}}. If no valid information is available, it will be presented as "Taxi, from {{origin}} to {{destination}}, no valid information." If the group size exceeds the maximum occupancy, multiple cars are required to accommodate everyone.
